author: Xbox
description:
Trapped in a deadly time loop, surgeon Cole Mason must face gruesome deaths, outsmart an evolving parasite, and make life-or-death choices in Dead Reset, an interactive sci-fi horror where your survival hinges on dying—and learning from it. Developed by Wales Interactive and Dark Rift Horror.

Out now on Xbox Series X|S and Xbox One, play the demo now!

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/dead-reset/9mv9l1t63r4d

author: Xbox
description:
ENDLESS Legend 2 is available now with PC Game Pass!

Lead your people to victory on an ever-evolving world in this strategy game featuring asymmetric factions led by powerful heroes. Build your empire, wield political influence, and raise grand armies to wage war in a race to uncover dark secrets buried within the planet.

author: Xbox
description:
Requiem for the dead. Nightmare for the living.

Resident Evil Requiem is the highly anticipated ninth title in the mainline Resident Evil series. Prepare to escape death in a heart-stopping experience that will chill you to your core.
 
A new era of survival horror begins when Resident Evil Requiem launches February 27, 2026 for Xbox Series X|S.

©CAPCOM

author: Xbox
description:
Gloomy Eyes is a single-player “self-coop” cozy horror adventure set in a Tim Burton-esque world. where you switch between two unique characters. Available Now on Xbox X|S!

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/gloomy-eyes/9nd15j624dfh

Players will alternate between controlling two unique characters as they embark on a journey to bring sunlight back to a world plunged into nasty, bitter darkness. The game is set in a lovingly haunting visual aesthetic, reminiscent of Corpse Bride and The Nightmare Before Christmas.

 There’s no gore or jump scares, just an enchanting, haunting atmosphere and a whimsical tale of forbidden companionship that will tug at your undead heartstrings.

SUBSCRIBE TO XBOX: https://xbx.lv/2EEjmaR

author: Xbox
description:
Get ready to slay the runway—Bratz Rhythm & Style is officially launched!
Immerse yourself in a rhythm-infused fashion world:
• Join Cloe, Yasmin, Sasha & Jade in a global Fashion Tour across six cities
• Customize your look with 400+ clothes, hairstyles, & makeup options
• Groove to So Good and other Bratz hits in Story Mode and Party Mode
• Battle style villains like Burdine and the Tweevils in fierce challenges
Bratz Rhythm & Style is now available on Xbox. 

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/bratz-rhythm-style/9p76mmjg50ds
